entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of showers or drizzle. Low 9. POP 70%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers or drizzle early this evening. 70 percent chance of showers before morning. Fog patches developing after midnight. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light before morning. Low 9. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Saturday 29 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Rain. High 12.
entry.summary: Rain. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind becoming west 30 km/h in the afternoon. High 12. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Saturday 29 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers in the evening and after midnight. A few showers beginning overnight. Wind west 30 km/h becoming light late in the evening. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Saturday 29 April 2023
